mapper.select: Select id as sectionId,submission_id as submissionId,sectionName,videoPath,rating as userRating , consultant_rating as cmRating , hiring_manager_rating as hmRating from resume_sections where submission_id = #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

Select c.id as commentId,c.submission_id as submissionId,CONCAT_WS(',',u.firstName,u.lastName) as commentedBy , u.role as role, c.comment , c.created_at as createdAt from comments c , users u where submission_id = #{submissionId} and u.id = c.user_id order by c.created_at
mapper.update: UPDATE available_times SET date = #{element.date},fromTime=#{element.fromTime},toTime=#{element.toTime},timeZone=#{element.timeZone} WHERE id=#{element.id}
